bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLVI. Belgium, Greece, Ireland, Israel, Norway, Holland, Republic of Georgia, Spain. Published by Tiziano DORANDI.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. XLVI, 1361-1402. - 1361: Belgio: Gand, Bibliotheek der Rijksuniversiteit; - 1362: Grecia: Atene, Società Archeologica; - 1363: Irlanda: Dublino, The Chester Beatty Library; - 1364-1390: Israele: Gerusalemme, The Hebrew University; - 1391: Norvegia: Oslo, Universitetsbiblioteket; - 1392: Olanda: Leida, Rijksmuseum van Oudheden; - 1393-1394: Olanda: Leida, Bibliotheek der Rijksuniversiteit; - 1395: Repubblica di Georgia: Tiflis, Accademia di Georgia; - 1396: Spagna: Montserrat, Abbazia Benedettina; - 1397: Spagna: León, Cattedrale; - 1398-1402: Spagna: Madrid, Archivo Histórico Nacional.

BRUCKNER Albert † and Robert MARICHAL, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLVI. Belgium, Greece, Ireland, Israel, Norway, Holland, Republic of Georgia, Spain. Published by Tiziano DORANDI.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1995, in fol., ix-89 pp., ill. ISBN 3-85951-181-5.
